body.p: The Board considered the following issues in relation to in‑process research and development (IPR&D) projects acquired in a business combination:

li.p: whether the proposed criteria for recognising intangible assets acquired in a business combination separately from goodwill should also be applied to IPR&D projects;
the subsequent accounting for IPR&D projects recognised as assets separately from goodwill; and
the treatment of subsequent expenditure on IPR&D projects recognised as assets separately from goodwill.

body.p: The Board’s deliberations on issue (a), although included in the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 3, are also, for the sake of completeness, outlined below.
